caption.p: Time series of Ascophyllum nodosum growth at the studied sub-Arctic and Arctic populations. The dots and the solid lines, respectively, show growth observations and running mean of 3 years. Growth observations at Kronprinsens Ejland in 1957–1958 and 1984–1985 (Wilce 1964; Hansen et al. 2004) and at Qeqertarsuaq in 1997–1998 (Hansen et al. 2004) are identified by open circles. Growth time series at Kronprinsens Ejland since 1995 is highlighted in the inserted plot
